summary: Joseph A. Thomas is identified as an employee of the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations based on payroll certifications from October 1977, November 1977, and May 1978. The documents list his name, position, and salary within the committee. However, the specific role or responsibilities of Joseph A. Thomas within the Select Committee on Assassinations are not detailed in these documents.
significance: The significance of Joseph A. Thomas lies in his employment within the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating his involvement in the investigation, though the extent and nature of his contribution are not specified in the provided documents.
